item.title: Learning how to use Hugo
item.description: I have been trying (and failing) to learn how to create and use a static website to encourage myself to learn new things and write about the various projects I busy myself with. My quest started with a site made using the Jekyll static site generator and its built-in integration with github pages. This worked for a while but since I didn’t really research how best to use it and add content, it ended up sitting on GitHub gathering dust.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction # This is bold text, and this is emphasised text. Today is the 13th of June and I am procrastinating doing other things to make a static website for the millionth time. This time i’m going to use it.
